participant_1.background:
I've never been to California, but my books have been read by people all over the world.
I do not like to talk about my personal life.
My worst moment was when I had to be away from my children for a week for a work trip.
i am stuck in a wheel chair.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.

participant_2.background:
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
i like pizza.
I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them.
I have not been in a fight, but I've seen my sister in one.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm doing alright, thanks. I'm just a bit tired. I've been writing a lot of books lately.
That's awesome! I love to read. What kind of books do you write?
I write mostly fiction, but I've also written a few non-fiction books. My favorite books to write are romance novels.
I love romance novels! I've read a lot of them. What's your favorite book that you've written?
My favorite book is called "The Love of My Life." It's about a woman who falls in love with a man who is in a wheelchair.
Wow, that sounds like a really interesting story! I'd love to read it.
You're welcome to borrow it from me if you'd like.
That would be great! Thank you!
No problem. I'm glad to hear that you're interested in reading my books.
